name: PrayerAssistant
0:
”Alexa open Prayer Assistant”
”What time is Fajr?”
”How long until the next prayer?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: prayer assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Easy to use Alexa assistant for Muslims all over the world to find out what time prayer is. You can ask Alexa what time the next upcoming prayer is, or how long until then, or you can ask about a specific prayer. 
Start by saying " Alexa open prayer assistant". 
From there you can ask questions like "What time is Maghrib?", "How long until the next salah", or "What time is the next prayer?"
This skill requires location permission so that accurate timings can be given based off timezone and locale.
